title: Location Tags: bu'u, fa'a, to'o
goal: Learn to add precise location information.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Cause tags review:

ri'a = ? (type)
mu'i = ? (type)
ki'u = ? (type)

(Answers: physical cause, motivation, justification)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
cmana x1 is a mountain/hill in terrain x2 mountain/hill
rirxe x1 is a river flowing to x2 from x3 river

Location Tags

Cmavo Meaning Direction
bu'u at (location) static
fa'a toward/facing direction
to'o away from direction
ne'a near proximity

Using bu'u (At)

mi cadzu bu'u la .paris.

I walk at Paris. (in Paris)

mi gunka bu'u lo zdani

I work at home.

Using fa'a (Toward)

mi klama fa'a lo cmana

I go toward the mountain.

mi catlu fa'a do

I look toward you.

Using to'o (Away From)

mi bajra to'o lo gerku

I run away from the dog.

mi klama to'o lo zdani

I go away from home.

Key Point

bu'u = at (static), fa'a = toward, to'o = away from.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Use bu'u

Translate:

  1. I work at home.
  2. Alice lives at Paris.
  3. I walk at the field.
Answers
  1. mi gunka bu'u lo zdani
  2. la .alis. cu xabju bu'u la .paris.
  3. mi cadzu bu'u lo foldi

Exercise 2: Use fa'a and to'o

Translate:

  1. I go toward the mountain.
  2. The dog runs toward me.
  3. I run away from the river.
Answers
  1. mi klama fa'a lo cmana
  2. lo gerku cu bajra fa'a mi
  3. mi bajra to'o lo rirxe

Exercise 3: New Vocabulary

Translate:

  1. This is a mountain.
  2. I see a river.
  3. The mountain is big.
Answers
  1. ti cmana
  2. mi viska lo rirxe
  3. lo cmana cu barda

items.text: I run away from the river.

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I work at home." → mi gunka bu'u lo zdani
  2. "I go toward the mountain." → mi klama fa'a lo cmana
  3. "The river is long." → lo rirxe cu clani

Summary

You learned location tags: bu'u (at), fa'a (toward), to'o (away from). These add precise location information.
